author: Fextralife
description:
The First Berserker Khazan: Too Hard or Just Right?
In this, the First Berserker Khazan, we're going to talk about something that has been talked about a lot in this game, and that is the topic of difficulty in this game. Is the game too difficult? Is it too hard? A lot of people have been discussing this and some people think it's the hardest souls game ever. It's even harder than Sekiro. So that's a topic that I want get into this video. 

Wiki: https://firstberserkerkhazan.wiki.fextralife.com/First+Berserker+Khazan+Wiki

0:00 - Is First Berserker Khazan Too Hard?
0:44 - My playthrough
1:54 - 54 Million Deaths
2:47 - Viper, Volbaino and Maluca Boss
4:02 - Game Completion
5:48 - Most Popular Weapon Type
6:51 - Death by Bosses
8:03 - Revenant of Adversity
8:55 - Most Popular Armor Sets
10:15 - Why this game is Hard

title: The First Berserker Khazan: Too Hard or Just Right?
